definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: I did something bad with a married guy.
sentences.chinese: 我跟有婦之夫在一起做了不好的事。

sentences.english: As a married man, he has to think of his family.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個有婦之夫，他必須考慮他的家庭。

sentences.english: The young man is a married person now.
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人現在是有婦之夫了。

sentences.english: She's been fooling around with a married man.
sentences.chinese: 她一直和一個有婦之夫鬼混。

sentences.english: Why is that straight women form insane crushes on gay and married men? Simple.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼直人女會爲男同志和有婦之夫而瘋狂呢？
